sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The blessed'st birth that euer was: or, The blessed birth of our Lord and Sauior Iesus Christ Preached at the Fleet, the 25. of Decem: A. Dom. 1627. By Henry Greenvvood preacher of the word of God. Greenwood, Henry, b. 1544 or 5.
[6], 31, [9] p.
By E. Purslow for H. B[ell] and M. B[ell] and are to be so'd [sic] by Iohn Grismond at the signe of the Gun in Ivie-Lane, London : 1634.
Publishers' names from STC. Signatures: A¹² B C⁴; reimposed with altered signatures (except for B2, which is retained on P9) as O9-Q6 of STC 12331.5.--STC. Running title reads: The blessed birth of the Lord Iesus. Misbound; quire C bound after title page. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.) Library.
=======

[6], 31, [9] p.
By E. Purslow for H. B[ell] and M. B[ell] and are to be so'd [sic] by Iohn Grismond at the signe of the Gun in Ivie-Lane, London : 1634.

Running title reads: The blessed birth of the Lord Iesus. Misbound; quire C bound after title page.
